properties.areaDesc: Vermilion to Avon Point OH; Avon Point to Willowick OH
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 12 at 10:17AM EST until January 12 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 10 to 15 knots with gusts up to 25 knots and
waves 2 to 5 feet.

* WHERE...Lake Erie nearshore waters from Vermilion to Avon
Point OH and Lake Erie nearshore waters from Avon Point to
Willowick OH.

* WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
